bibl.title: The Numeric Practice of the Hellenica Oxyrhynchia.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Comparison of numeric profiles. - 3. Observations on specific passages. - 4. Conclusion. - Appendix: 1. Coding system for numbers applied to a modern text; - 2. Coding system for numbers in historical narrative; - 3. Stages in coding process; - 4. Statistics on aspects of numeric practice. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Catherine Rubincam, The Numeric Practice of the Hellenica Oxyrhynchia.
Catherine Rubincam (ed.), Hellenica Oxyrhynchia after 100 Years = Mouseion (Canada) 9 (2009) pp. 303-329, 5 tabl.

1. Introduction. - 2. Comparison of numeric profiles. - 3. Observations on specific passages. - 4. Conclusion. - Appendix: 1. Coding system for numbers applied to a modern text; - 2. Coding system for numbers in historical narrative; - 3. Stages in coding process; - 4. Statistics on aspects of numeric practice. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
